reviews.review: Well, I've played this game for many years and never wrote a review about it, TF2 is a abusive relationship, it punches the shit out of you, but then takes you to dinner. Starting out you know next to nothing, and you get crushed, hard, some classes are easier to start out with than others, namely pyro, soldier, and sniper, heck, even heavy. But still, you will die, a lot, and get dominated, a lot, but eventually things start getting easier, you learn more tricks, feel for the maps, and unlock weapons that help you along the way, outside sources help, guides on how to do things, but those only go so far, and due to changes, might not always be correct, you need to find your own way, get a few people to play with so your salt is slightly less, have fun, and collect hats if you have the disposable income. All in all, TF2 has helped me learn some things about myself, having played for 250+ days of my life it's bound to. If you plan on playing, welcome, this game is far from perfect, but there isn't another one like it.

Muito bom o jogo, da pau em muitos jogos pagos e ainda caro na steam .
THIS GAME IS FUN I HAVE 5K+ HOURS DEFINETLY TRY IT.

Such a nice and classic FPS that might as well date back to the golden age of the FPS genre. Team Fortress 2 offers much more than just your standard 'run and gun' genre. 

Don't be disappointed if you're new to this game. Enter a match, and have fun while learning the basics.

A few hours later, you might be at the top of the leaderboards.

This game is free-to-play. But you can upgrade to premium if you want to.

Long story short, Team Fortress 2 is one of the best class-themed FPS to be created.

Team Fortres 2 is a first person shooter theat has evolved troughout the years enjoying a beautiful comunity that always has contributed to the game, it also has a very soft and friendly controls and can be mastered in little to no time. If you put effort in the game also doesn't lacks costumization, with it's taunts and cosmetics and different weapons with different characteristics and features,  the game brings subclasses(more than count soldier,pyro,demoman,heavy,engineer,medic,sniper,spy)
Un juego muy bueno y divertido

Un juego muy divertido que no tiene nada que envidiarle a otros juegos de moda de la actualidad.
Aun si no eres un fanatico de jugar online, no te puede faltar este juegazo en tu biblioteca. Que adem√°s es Free To Play!

It's an old game, but it shall never get old.

This is an amazing fps, chill, lightweight, very casual but still skillfull. You can jump on a server and sink hours in this game without even noticing. Great to play with friends and strangers alike (apart from the ocasional screamers even the fights between players in voice chat are very entertaining).

A great variety of game modes, maps, weapons and classes...and hats! don't forget the hats

P.S: Just wanted to say I just got my premium update with the orange box and voted TF2 for the "Labor of Love" award, cause even reduced to a small team the devs keep pushing content and supporting the game for the community.
Its a decent game considering how long it lasted. Many games do not last this long but if you try this game out you will see why this game lasted a long period of time
